msg.msgText: Name Name of the queue. Description A description of the queue. AllowSend Specify if the queue allows new messages to be sent. Options:True,False Default:True ConcurrentConsumers Specify if the queue allows multiple concurrent consumers. Options:True,False Default:True MaxMessages Maximum message count that can be buffered on the queue. Options:1-20000000 Default:5000

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
